profileAlternative.name: Ravindar G.
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist at Credit Suisse
profileAlternative.summary: Strong experience in data science, statistical analysis and statistical modelling. Demonstrated history of working in the HealthCare, Financial, Retail, IT domains. Experienced in building statistical models models such as SVM, Linear Regression, Logistic Regression, SEM and PCA, Factor & Cluster Analysis, Segmentation using SAS, R, SPSS. Expert in data visualization using Tableau and PowerPoint. Strong research and analytics professional with a Masters Degree in Statistics and MBA in Marketing & Finance.

aboutAlternative.text: Strong experience in data science, statistical analysis and statistical modelling. Demonstrated history of working in the HealthCare, Financial, Retail, IT domains. Experienced in building statistical models models such as SVM, Linear Regression, Logistic Regression, SEM and PCA, Factor & Cluster Analysis, Segmentation using SAS, R, SPSS. Expert in data visualization using Tableau and PowerPoint. Strong research and analytics professional with a Masters Degree in Statistics and MBA in Marketing & Finance.

given.text: Ravindar is a proactive team member with a penchant for numbers. His experience in the field of market research backed by expertise in statistics, always helped the team in coming up with actionable insights for our stakeholders. He is methodical, organized and very helpful. He likes to automate redundant tasks in order to optimize the output. He is not just a guy who runs data. He is someone who runs data, questions it and makes sure every data point gets translated into tangible insights. Ability to relate survey data to industry trends is what makes him unique. He will be an asset to any organization. See less

Ravindar was a member of one of the first teams I worked with as a Manager of Data Processing at TNS (now Kantar).
It was apparent from the start that Ravindar possessed a quickness and technical abilities that set him apart from others. He is also a very reliable and dedicated partner who could be counted on in a crisis situation . This was put to the test on more than a few occasions.
I would highly recommend Ravindar for any position where these traits are valued.
See less
